content.html: LOL! They banned Will Smith for 10 years! Even after he resigned from the Academy! That's 2 years for each finger!🤚🏿 Meanwhile, Roman Polanski is still being nominated for new Oscars. 🤡 The national pastime of the US is punishing Black men disproportionately.
content.value:
LOL! They banned Will Smith for 10 years! Even after he resigned from the Academy! That's 2 years for each finger!🤚🏿

Meanwhile, Roman Polanski is still being nominated for new Oscars. 🤡

The national pastime of the US is punishing Black men disproportionately.
